items.text: spins in off a length, flicked to square leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, flat, punched between long-on and deep midwicket
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: MahneelMusa: "I'm more happy for Isam than for anyone else. This guy had to write through the humiliating test series day in day out. He and all the Bangladeshi journos deserve a series win for Bangladesh "
items.text: close shout for lbw.. where was the impact? Shakib shuffled across and tried to sweep but got hit on the pad. Impact outside off
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: spins sharply away from a shortish length, Shakib flays it through point
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: lets it do its thing and taps it through cover and point
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, backs away and punches to long-on
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: advances down the ground and carves it over point
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length on the pads, flicked behind square
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: cut away through point
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: pitched up on leg, pushed down to long-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: dropped. Hetmyer makes all the effort to get there, running back, lines himself up behind it and ends up dropping it, after Shakib gets a top-edge on the sweep
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run
Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, pushed to mid-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full on middle, driven down to long-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short, spins away, flayed to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, spins away, stands in the crease and blocks
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: punched to long-off with a straight bat
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, spins away, cut to point. They take off for a single and despite the dive, a direct hit may have made things interesting
items.postText: And in the process, Shakib has hurt himself and is being tended to.
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full, leans into a drive to long-off
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short, wide, cut past cover, long-off gets around it
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: dipping full toss on off, punched down to long-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: comes down the track and gets hit on the pad outside off before it rolls away to point
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 leg bye

items.text: strides forward and blocks into the leg side
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: stays back and turns a length ball away to square leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: floats it up on middle, nudged away into the on side
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run
